file_content.text: Those Mandos will think twice before messing with us again.
The Mandalorian leader wouldn't listen to reason. He's dead.
Can't say I'm sad about that.
Not much I can offer a Jedi other than thanks. You really saved our hide.
Whatcha did here will really boost morale. Maybe even get some kids thinking about joining the Republic military.
You did real good, smuggler. Wish I could offer ya more, but Tatooine life ain't a rich one.
We'd be worse off than a womp rat in a krayt's belly if it weren't for you.
Anyway, looks like the desert's 'bout to act up again. Take care out there.
Stomp those mercs good. I'll keep the people here calm.
A Jedi! Ha! For a second there I thought you were a mirage.
Didn't expect to see you walk in off the sand, sir.
You must be real sure of yourself to swagger in off the sand without any backup.
You're a welcome sight. Nice break from sandstorms and mirages.
I'm supposed to keep these people safe, but they're scared. For good reason, too.
Word on the sand is the Mandalorians are preppin' a raid.
The Empire has a strong presence here. We can't afford to lose a single outpost.
They mustn't succeed.
Glad you think so, Master Jedi. Maybe you could even help us out.
More likely the Mandalorians are attacking for sport.
They won't be after supplies.
They're a sadistic bunch, all right. That's why I figured you could pitch in.
Nothing short of a small militia army will deflect those mercs.
You don't look prepared.
We aren't exactly overflowing with volunteers. Not unless you'd like to sign up.
I say we lay low, wait for those mercs to rush in, then we smoke 'em.
We better stage an ambush.
I'd love to do just that, but the raid won't stop as long as the man behind it lives.
How close is their camp?
Their camp ain't far. The mercs moved real close once their leader took over.
They aren't my problem.
If we lose this post, we might as well hand the desert over to the Empire. But you can save us.
The Mandos are being riled up by a warlord. Mean brute. Got more scars than I got horns on my head.
Make that scum leader eat sand, and you shut down the raid. Whaddaya say?
I'll stop the Mandalorians.
Wish I could be there to see those poor mercs' faces.
How many Mandalorians are out there?
What am I up against?
Best I can guess is a small army. Nothing you can't handle.
The Mando leader calls the shots from inside his ship. Knock his boys around, bruise his ego and he'll come charging out. Then he's all yours.
I say "no." [Refuse quest]
We can't hold 'em off long. But I can't run. I won't.
Be careful. Mandalorians are out there.
